sentence.Network_en: I need a cask of wine and some apples.
sentence.Network_cn: 我需要一桶酒和一些苹果.

sentence.Network_en: The cask savours of the first fill.
sentence.Network_cn: 酒桶长留初次装酒的香气.

sentence.Network_en: He drew some cognac from the cask into a tin cannikin.
sentence.Network_cn: 他从酒桶里倒了一些白兰地到一只小锡杯里.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 外贸包装英语 - 豆丁网 ... barrel 粗腰桶(琵琶桶) cask 桶 curing container 腌制槽［桶］.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... cashier 出纳员 cask 木桶 casket 小木盒.
找一个酒桶（cask）一般里面是没有酒的，点它就一个选项（Brew），然后在出来的酒中选（Ale），等酒桶里有酒了，再点酒桶，选…
2008年1月31日 -  博尔钦斯基:“(英文)现在我们正将装有核燃料的屏蔽罐(cask)放到火车上,今晚火车就离开前往俄罗斯。这是美国、俄罗斯联邦与原子能机构核不扩散承诺的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from French casque or Spanish casco 'helmet'. The current senses appear only in English; from the late 16th to the late 18th centuries the word also denoted a helmet (compare with casque)

entry.def: A cask is a wooden barrel that is used for storing things, especially alcoholic drink.

means.word_mean: 1. the quantity a cask will hold
2. a cylindrical container that holds liquids
